def Load(widget): if widget.Entity == None: return
ordemCompra = widget.Entity.BuscaIndexStatus() if ordemCompra == 5: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False elif ordemCompra == 3: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False elif ordemCompra == 4: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
